name: PeninsulaBalvihar
0:
”Alexa, ask Peninsula Balvihar to play assembly”
”Alexa, ask Peninsula Balvihar to play one dot one”
”Alexa, ask Peninsula Balvihar to play To Respect Parents and Teachers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peninsula balvihar
des:
Based in Foster City / San Mateo, CA, Peninsula Balvihar is a community of about 80 children & their families that meet every sunday, to discuss & learn, Hindu religious morals & Indian cultural values. We make it fun & easy for the kids - no home work - we mix it up with exercises, games & lots of humor to make it a unique learning experience - that kids look forward to every week.

This skill helps newcomers to the Peninsula Balvihar family get acquainted with the songs and prayers. Please note that the prayers are in Sanskrit and Hindi; the lyrics can be found in our handbook.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
